description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale officially begins on July 12, but early deals are already live on the e-commerce website. These deals mean you can buy tablets at discounted rates from major brands like Samsung, Lenovo, Apple, and Acer. Shoppers can also use eligible credit cards can get instant discounts on their purchases.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Early Deals on Tablets Revealed Before the Sale Begins
From Rs. 40K to Rs. 60K: Something for Everyone This Prime Day

description: Amazon Pay’s Rewards Gold program offers 5 percent cashback for Prime members and 3 percent for non-Prime users on eligible transactions. The rewards will be unlocked after completing 25 Amazon Pay transactions, including UPI, bill payments, or shopping. Cashback applies to categories like grocery, clothing, travel, food delivery, and apps like Ola, Domino's, and Zomato's District. It also includes added benefits for Amazon Pay ICICI Bank Credit Card holders.
title: Amazon Introduces Rewards Gold Cashback Program Ahead of Prime Day 2025 Sale

description: The Tesla chief executive officer commented on the plan hours after presenting a new iteration of Grok via video livestream. Musk and members of his xAI team touted improved voice conversations and benchmarks showing the new AI system scoring higher than models from OpenAI and others.
title: Elon Musk Says Grok Chatbot Is Coming to Tesla Vehicles by Next Week

description: Question What’s Real (QWR), an Indian deep-tech startup, unveiled Humbl, an artificial intelligence (AI)-powered smart glasses, on Thursday. The startup claims that Humbl is the first made in India AI smart glasses, and offers features similar to the Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses. The Indian version is said to come equipped with an AI assistant that can record videos, summarise conversations, play music, help with navigation, and more.
title: Indian Startup QWR Unveils AI-Powered Smart Glasses Humbl, to Be Shipped Later This Year

description: Vivo appears to be gearing up to launch a new  Vivo T4R smartphone. It is expected to arrive as Vivo's first phone in the R segment. The purported Vivo T4R is tipped to run on a MediaTek Dimensity chipset.
title: Vivo T4R 5G Tipped to Launch in India Soon; May Get MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC

description: The Acer Iconia Tab iM11 is priced at Rs. 23,999 in India for the 8GB RAM + 256GB storage variant and is available via Amazon, Flipkart, Acer’s website, and offline stores. It features an 11.45-inch 2.2K IPS display, a MediaTek Helio G99 SoC, a 16-megapixel rear and an 8-megapixel front-facing camera. The tablet is also equipped with a stereo quad speaker system and a 7,400mAh battery with 18W charging support.
title: Acer Iconia Tab iM11 Launched in India With 11.45-Inch Screen, 7,400mAh Battery: Price, Features

description: Airtel has listed a new recharge plan for its prepaid subscribers with unlimited calling, 1GB data, and 300 SMS. The new plan has a validity of 21 days. Moreover, the Indian telecom giant has set a limit of 100 SMS a day. As per the company website, this is now the cheapest unlimited prepaid plan that Airtel offers.
title: Airtel Announces New Rs. 189 Plan For Prepaid Customers With Unlimited Calling: All Details

description: Amazfit Active 2 Square was launched in India with a 1.75-inch AMOLED display. It has a BioTracker 6.0 PPG sensor for monitoring heart rate, sleep. It supports Bluetooth calling. The smartwatch offers more than 160 sports modes. It has Bluetooth 5.2 and BLE connectivity.
title: Amazfit Active 2 Square Launched in India With Over 160 Sports Modes, Bluetooth Calling: Price, Specifications

description: The Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale will run from July 12 to 14, offering major discounts across categories. Early deals on Amazon devices like the Echo, Fire TV Stick, and Kindle have already been revealed. Shoppers can also benefit from exchange offers, discount coupons, and SBI and ICICI Bank customers can get a 10 percent discount. Additional offers and deals will likely be unveiled once the sale officially begins.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Best Early Deals Currently Live on Amazon Echo, Kindle, Fire TV Stick and More

description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale is still two days away, but instead of waiting for July 12, individuals can take advantage of the Prime Day early deals right now. If you’re looking for a new smart TV, you can find early deals on brands such as Samsung, Kodak, Hisense, TCL, and Acer.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Check These Early Deals on Smart TVs

description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale will begin in India on July 12. Just days before the sale kicks off, the e-commerce website has revealed the discounted price of the Apple products. The Apple iPad, Watch, AirPods, MacBook, Mac, and other accessories are now listed with early price cuts.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Early Deals on iPad Air, MacBook, Other Apple Products Now Live

description: The Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale gets underway on July 12. The annual sale is a three-day affair this year, offering consumers a chance to get their hands on the products they have been planning to purchase, at lowered rates. Check out the early deals on smartphones such as the iQOO Z10 5G, Samsung Galaxy M16 5G, Redmi 13 5G, and more.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Early Deals on OnePlus Nord 5, iQOO Z10 5G, Samsung Galaxy M16 5G and More

description: Google is planning to introduce ads in AI Overviews in India later this year. The Mountain View-based tech giant made the announcement at its Google Marketing Live (GML) India event on Thursday. Alongside, the company also introduced a slew of new artificial intelligence (AI)-powered ad tools for brands and enterprises.
title: Google Announces Rollout of Ads in AI Overviews in India, AI-Powered Ad Solutions

description: Yaccarino, 61, made the announcement in a post on X suggesting it was her decision, though Musk has a history of dismissing deputies suddenly. "I've decided to step down as CEO of X," Yaccarino wrote.
title: Musk-Owned X's CEO Linda Yaccarino to Step Down in Surprise Move

description: The Elon Musk-led firm has been waiting since 2022 for licences to operate commercially in India. Last month, it received a key license from India's telecom ministry to launch, but has been waiting for a go-ahead from India's space regulator.
title: Musk's Starlink Receives India's Final Regulatory Nod for Launch

description: Oppo launched two smartphones as part of its Reno 14 series in China on May 15. The Reno 14 Pro 5G features a MediaTek Dimensity 8450 SoC and a 6,200mAh battery. Although the Chinese company is yet to confirm the launch, a tipster has posted on Weibo that Oppo could be gearing up to unveil the Reno 15 series in the second half of 2025.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Series Launch Timeline Tipped; Base Variant Could Get a Compact Display

description: Microsoft Outlook is down globally, impacting thousands of users who are unable to access emails on various platforms. The company has confirmed the outage, attributing it to issues within its mailbox infrastructure. Microsoft is actively working on a fix to resolve the widespread disruption, aiming to restore full email service for affected users.
title: Outlook Down? Microsoft Working on Fix After Thousands of Users Report Issues Accesing Outlook Emails

description: Perplexity launched its in-house web browser Comet on Wednesday. The artificial intelligence (AI) browser is powered by the company’s native search engine and various AI features. The browser’s most prominent feature is a sidebar assistant that can derive information from all opened tabs to answer user queries, summarise pages, and even perform certain actions on their behalf.
title: Perplexity Launches Comet AI Web Browser, Comes With an In-Built Sidebar Assistant

description: Samsung is reportedly gearing up to unveil its first tri-fold. Now, Samsung Mobile Chief TM Roh has reportedly revealed the launch timeline of samsung's first tri-fold smartphone. It is expected to be unveiled by the end of this year.
title: Samsung to Launch Its First Tri-Fold Smartphone by the End of This Year: Report

description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 kicks off on July 12 and the three-day sale will introduce significant deals on consumer electronics products, including laptops. Customers can avail of substantial discounts, on a wide range of Asus laptops, from the popular ROG and TUF gaming series, to the Zenbook, and Vivobook lineup. Here's all you need to know about Asus laptop discounts during the upcoming Amazon Prime Day sale.
title: Asus ROG Strix, TUF, Zenbook and Vivobook Laptops Discounts Announced Ahead of Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale

description: Dell Alienware 16 Aurora was launched in India on Thursday. The gaming laptop is said to have a travel-friendly design, with a starting weight of 2.49kg. It can be configured with up to Intel Core 7 Processor Series 2 and up to Nvidia GeForce RTX 5060 Laptop GPU. It sports a 16-inch WQXGA 120Hz screen and comes with Dolby Audio, Wi-Fi 7, and user-upgradable RAM and SSD slots
title: Dell Alienware 16 Aurora With Up to Nvidia GeForce RTX 5060 Laptop GPU Launched in India

description: Google Maps app is now available on Garmin smartwatches with turn-by-turn navigation. The app is available for free on the Connect IQ Store. It is to be noted that Google started rolling out turn-by-turn navigation for wearables running Wear OS in January 2023.
title: Garmin Announces Google Maps App With Support For Turn by Turn Navigation: All Details

description: Sony has announced the games joining PS Plus Game Catalog in July. This month's lineup is led by Cyberpunk 2077. The RPG was added to the service on July 9. Other games joining Game Catalog this month include survival title Abiotic Factor, action-RPG Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden, roguelike shooter Risk of Rain 2, construction and management sim Planet Zoo, and more.
title: PS Plus Game Catalog Adds Cyberpunk 2077, Abiotic Factor, Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden and More in July

description: Stalker 2: Heart of Chernobyl is coming to PS5 in late 2025, developer GSC Gameworld has announced. The game will support DualSense controller features and will come with enhancements for PS5 Pro, the developer said.
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl Is Coming to PS5 Later This Year

description: Grok 4 artificial intelligence (AI) model was released by xAI on Monday. The new AI model was introduced by xAI developers and company owner Elon Musk in a live stream on X (formerly known as Twitter). The company claimed that the new large language model (LLM) comes with a significantly improved reasoning ability and better performance across multiple subject areas.
title: Grok 4 AI Model Launched by Elon Musk's xAI Alongside the World’s Most Expensive AI Subscription Plan

description: The Sony WF-C710N earphones are priced at Rs. 8,990 in India, with a Rs. 1,000 cashback offer valid until July 31. Available in four colours, including a transparent Glass Blue variant, they feature ANC, Adaptive Sound Control, Quick Attention Mode, and AI-backed call noise cancellation. The earbuds offer up to 40 hours of battery life together with the case, without ANC. They support Multipoint Connectivity, DSEE, in-ear detection, touch controls, and Sony Sound Connect app compatibility.
title: Sony WF-C710N TWS Earphones Launched in India With ANC, Up to 40 Hours of Total Battery Life

description: After being listed on Mozilla Firefox’s add-ons page for months, the iCloud autofill passwords extension is now functional for Windows 11 users. Earlier, Apple had only provided support for Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge, according to Reddit users. However, there is no standalone password manager for iCloud passwords.
title: Apple Adds iCloud Passwords Support For Mozilla Firefox Via Browser Extension on Windows

description: Apple is reportedly developing an update system for sealed Mac computers, which could allow the company to ship devices from Apple Stores with the latest macOS version. It could mirror Apple's existing wireless update process for sealed iPhone units in stores, which can remotely power on the phone, install the newest software, and then shut it down.
title: Apple Reportedly Working on Sealed-Device Update System for MacBook Units at Apple Stores

description: JBL Tour Pro 3 were launched in India. The truly wireless stereo (TWS) earphones have a smart charging case that has a 1.57-inch touch display and use a hybrid dual driver system. They support LDAC audio codec. They come with JBL Spatial 360 with head tracking and feature adaptive noise cancellation (ANC).
title: JBL Tour Pro 3 TWS With Touch Display, Up to 44-Hour Playback Time Launched in India

description: The Lenovo Yoga Tab Plus features a 12.7-inch 3K PureSightPro display with a 144Hz refresh rate, up to 900 nits brightness, and TÜV Rheinland eye protection certifications. It is powered by a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC with 20 TOPS AI performance. It supports Lenovo AI Now, Google Gemini, AI Note, and AI Transcript. The tablet also carries Harman Kardon-tuned speakers and a 10,200mAh battery with 45W charging support.
title: Lenovo Yoga Tab Plus Launched in India With Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC, 10,200mAh Battery

description: Nothing Phone 3 will be available for purchase in India starting July 15. However, the company has announced an India-exclusive drop event that will offer consumers a chance to not only get a hands-on experience of the flagship handset, but also purchase the phone before its official open sale. Set to take place in Bengaluru, the first 100 consumers buying the Nothing Phone 3 will be eligible to get a complimentary Nothing Headphone 1.
title: Nothing Phone 3 India Exclusive Drop Event Set to Take Place on July 12; First 100 Buyers Get Free Headphone 1

description: OpenAI is reportedly working on an artificial intelligence (AI) web browser and is close to releasing it. As per the report, the San Francisco-based AI firm is readying the browser to compete with Google Chrome. The name of this browser is not known; however, it is said that it will support AI capabilities natively.
title: OpenAI Reportedly Working On an AI-Powered Web Browser, to Compete With Google Chrome

description: Apple is reportedly developing an artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot for its Apple Support app. As per the report, the Cupertino-based tech giant is working on a text-based AI-powered Support Assistant that can help users with their queries immediately. This will reportedly provide another avenue for people to get quick help, without having to wait for a call back or text message from a live support agent.
title: Apple Support App Reportedly Getting a ChatGPT-Style AI Chatbot to Assist Users

description: Apple is rumoured to be developing a successor to the Vision Pro and it could be launched as early as this year, as per a seasoned journalist. The Apple Vision Pro successor is said to come with several minor upgrades in tow, including a faster processor, improved components that support artificial intelligence (AI) tasks, and a new strap option.
title: Apple Vision Pro Successor to Reportedly Launch in 2025 With M4 Chip, Better Components for AI

description: Google's Gemini AI assistant is now rolling out to Wear OS smartwatches, replacing the Google Assistant. The Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 series, unveiled recently, will be among the first to feature the Gemini AI assistant. It will be available across various brands running recent Wear OS versions, while Wear OS 6 devices will support Gemini integration with built-in applications.
title: Gemini Rolls Out to Wear OS Smartwatches With Support for Natural Language Commands

description: iPhone 17 Air is said to go official in September. A new leak claims that it will be launched in black, silver, light gold, and light blue colours. The light blue could resemble the Sky Blue shade of the MacBook Air M4. The iPhone 16 Plus is available in Black, Pink, White, Teal and Ultramarine colour options.
title: iPhone 17 Air Colour Options Hinted in New Leak; Could Launch in Four Shades

description: Google on Wednesday released the latest Pixel drop ahead of schedule, and it brings several new features to Pixel devices. One of the biggest announcements is a free one year subscription to the Google AI Pro plan for Pixel 9 Pro owners. This gives them access to the company’s latest Veo 3 video generation model. Further, it brings Google’s recently introduced AI Mode in Circle-to-Search along with Gemini on Wear OS-powered Pixel Watch.
title: Google's Latest Pixel Drop Brings Free Google AI Pro Subscription for Pixel 9 Pro, AI Mode in Circle to Search

description: The Samsung Galaxy S25 FE has appeared on the WPC website, hinting at its imminent launch and its design, which closely resembles the Galaxy S24 FE. It features a flat display with a centred hole-punch camera and is seen in a dark grey finish. The phone will likely support Qi2 wireless charging via compatible cases (BPP profile). The Galaxy S25 FE is expected to sport a 6.7-inch 120Hz Flexible OLED display and ship with Android 16-based One UI 8.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Design Appears on WPC Database; May Support Qi2 Wireless Charging

description: Tecno Pova 7 5G series sale in India begins today (Thursday). The lineup was launched on July 4 comprising the Pova 7 5G and the Pova 7 Pro 5G. Both handsets are powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultimate processor and pack 6,000mAh batteries. The phones also come with a Delta LED light interface at the back. As part of the launch offers, buyers can take advantage of bank-related benefits to get the Tecno Pova 7 5G series at a reduced price.
title: Tecno Pova 7 5G, Pova 7 Pro 5G With Dimensity 7300 Ultimate SoC Sale in India Starts Today: Price, Offers
